song_name: Powerful ft Ellie Goulding and Tarrus Riley
metrics_conclusion: Powerful ft Ellie Goulding and Tarrus Riley has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Powerful ft Ellie Goulding and Tarrus Riley is written in the key of E Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 2nd most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 31st most popular  among all keys. The E Dorian scale is similar to the E Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (Câ™¯).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree.
